amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $111,641,000 and reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $161,879,450.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $111,641,000 and reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $161,879,450.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 245 (Roll no. 375).
